_annotationBlock.description: React Native PoC project for WorldChef mobile stack comparison with Expo CLI, New Architecture, and baseline packages.
_annotationBlock.purpose_statement: React Native implementation of WorldChef PoC to evaluate performance, AI code generation effectiveness, and developer experience compared to Flutter.
key_logic_points: Uses Expo CLI for simplified development and deployment
Configured with New Architecture for performance evaluation
Includes axios for API communication with mock server

interfaces_provided.name: React Native Mobile App
interfaces_provided.details: Cross-platform mobile application for recipe browsing and management
interfaces_provided.notes: Will implement recipe list, detail views, and basic user interactions

requisites.description: Android SDK API level 31+ for Android deployment
Xcode latest stable for iOS deployment

external_dependencies.name: expo
external_dependencies.reason: Expo framework for simplified React Native development

external_dependencies.name: react-native
external_dependencies.reason: Core React Native framework with New Architecture support

external_dependencies.name: axios
external_dependencies.reason: HTTP client for API communication with mock data server

external_dependencies.name: zustand
external_dependencies.reason: Lightweight state management for application state

external_dependencies.name: react-navigation
external_dependencies.reason: Navigation library for screen routing and navigation

external_dependencies.name: @shopify/flash-list
external_dependencies.reason: High-performance list component for recipe lists

quality_notes.manual_review_comment: Initial project structure created with baseline PoC packages and New Architecture enabled. Ready for feature implementation.
